Wow... this is...after all A GAME. Why do some people become so bent up that they put death threats against others... SMH. Some people just suck.![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
Sampa, if this took place using Kerbal Space Forum PM's have your friend report them, there is a button next to the "Forward" button for this.

That absolutely needs to be dealt with Sampa. Even if it wasn't on the forums, your friend needs to block this user wherever there is contact between them, and your friend must make sure this user cannot receive any more contact info of your friend's.

This is a serious issue, not to be taken lightly. From personal experience, trust me, there is no other way to deal with it other than closing all contact with this user.
